exclusion.criterion: allergy to contrast media or iodine
exclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: unable to cooperate or provide informed consent
exclusion.label: not_met

notes: 17-year-old boy with severe migratory pain in the right lower quadrant of his abdomen, nausea and vomiting, fever, tenderness, rebound tenderness, guarding on palpation, elevated WBC with dominant neutrophils, CT scan showing acute perforated appendicitis with free fluid in the pelvis, diagnostic laparoscopy revealing phlegmon. Candidate for emergent laparoscopic appendectomy under general anesthesia.
